item.title: Powell forced to stave off uprisings in markets and on his own Fed board as his term ends
item.description: Powell faces if not the most difficult challenge of his time in office at least the trickiest.

item.title: Food inflation is killing Chipotle. Wall Street sees little way out for company if it doesn't raise prices

item.title: Beijing’s buzzing after Trump-Xi talks and betting a trade ‘honeymoon’ could be next
item.description: As Chinese President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Donald Trump met Thursday, many people in China cheered the in-person meeting.
